apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

path.description: Path is the path within the repository to the API definition.

ref.description: Ref is the git reference (branch, tag, or commit SHA).

repository.description: Repository is the git repository URL.

git.description: Git defines the git repository source for the API dependency.

url.description: URL is the HTTP/HTTPS URL to fetch the API dependency from.

http.description: HTTP defines the HTTP source for the API dependency.

version.description: Version is the Kubernetes API version (e.g., "v1.33.0").

k8s.description: K8s defines the Kubernetes API version for the dependency.

type.description: Type defines the type of API dependency.

items.description:
APIDependencies defines a reference to an external API dependency.
NOTE: This is an experimental feature and is subject to change.

apiDependencies.description:
APIDependencies are the API dependencies for this project.
NOTE: This is an experimental feature and is subject to change.

version.description: Semantic version constraints of Crossplane that package is compatible with.

crossplane.description: CrossplaneConstraints specifies a packages compatibility with Crossplane versions.

configuration.description:
Configuration is the name of a Configuration package image.
Must be a fully qualified image name, including the registry,
Deprecated: Specify an apiVersion, kind, and package instead.

function.description:
Function is the name of a Function package image.
Must be a fully qualified image name, including the registry,
Deprecated: Specify an apiVersion, kind, and package instead.

package.description:
Package OCI reference of the dependency. Only used when apiVersion and
kind are set.
Must be a fully qualified image name, including the registry,
repository, and tag. For example, "registry.example.com/repo/package:tag".

provider.description:
Provider is the name of a Provider package image.
Must be a fully qualified image name, including the registry,
Deprecated: Specify an apiVersion and kind instead.

version.description: Version is the semantic version constraints of the dependency image.

items.description:
Dependency is a dependency on another package. A dependency can be of an
arbitrary API version and kind, but Crossplane expects package dependencies
to behave like a Crossplane package. Specifically it expects to be able to
create the dependency and set its spec.package field to a package OCI
reference.

prefix.description: Prefix is the prefix that should be matched.

type.description: Type is the type of match.

items.description: ImageMatch defines a rule for matching image.

matchImages.description: MatchImages is a list of image matching rules that should be satisfied.

prefix.description: Prefix is the prefix to use when rewriting the image.

rewriteImage.description: RewriteImage defines how a matched image should be rewritten.

items.description: ImageConfig defines a set of rules for matching and rewriting images.

apis.description:
APIs is the directory holding the project's apis. If not
specified, it defaults to `apis/`.

examples.description:
Examples is the directory holding the project's examples. If not
specified, it defaults to `examples/`.

functions.description:
Functions is the directory holding the project's functions. If not
specified, it defaults to `functions/`.

operations.description:
Operations is the directory holding the project's operations. If not
specified, it defaults to `operations/`.

tests.description:
Tests is the directory holding the project's tests. If not
specified, it defaults to `tests/`.

paths.description:
ProjectPaths configures the locations of various parts of the project, for
use at build time.

spec.description:
ProjectSpec is the spec for a Project. Since a Project is not a Kubernetes
resource there is no Status, only Spec.

description:
Project defines an Upbound Project, which can be built into a Crossplane
Configuration.
